About

Me

INTRODUCTION

Being enthusiastic in technology and how software is being developed through SDLC, I have successfully finished "QA - Manual testing" course in Tnation company and skills during course of "Automation testing" at Gowi using C#, Selenium and Specflow as the base. At my current position as QA Analyst and Software Tester I've been developing further more skills from the perspective of Business Analysis and QA methodologies.

SOPREX

January of 2019 - PRESENT

QA Analyst

In this role I've been creating detailed Business Requirement and Test Documentation followed by functional, regression and business logic testing.
